Topic.Title: I Can't Take it Any More

Message.Msg: If you trade momentuums, Amazon is on a downward spiral and their customer service is a nightmare/ I received a duplicate amazon storecard in today's mail and no one at customer service could give me a good reason or any explanation why one was mailed to me without my notification or request or problem. Business as usual and business is bad. You are going to need a lot of good deals and a hope and a prayer to drive this puppy back over 300

Message.Title: Amazon Web Site
Message.Msg: Even though they got the website up for buyers, they are Still having a lot of internal problems for sellers. You sell an item and ship but you are not getting paid, and when you contact them them thru chat, they chat back with a form letter about how nothing is wrong but magically your money shows up while chatting with them.
